title: [SOLVED]820-4924 fan not working.
message:
hi guys,
                      820-4924 fan is not working . system is fully functional otherwise .  missing SMC_FAN_0_CTL  hence motor control is missing . SMC_FAN_0_CTL comes from under the smc so  kindly advise . it had liquid damage around u3210 , cleaned and new u3210 fitted already .  warming up near u3210 brings fan to life but the fan  goes dead again after a little while . 


kindly advise

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 fan not working.
message: Fan does not spin on these until it gets hot. This machine is fine.

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 fan not working.
message: thanks for the help and information :D.

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 fan not working.
message:
hi ,
                 went back to the machine and tested as advised . it seems it has a problem as fan does not kick in .  kindly advise 
thanks again

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 fan not working.
message: It wont kick in until it gets hot. Unless its throttling you dont have a issue

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 fan not working.
message: Run internal diagnostic by holding down D on startup. It will test the fan.
